name: Wings of Peace VR: DayBreak
description: Card, defense, shootingï¼Ÿcombine all of this! "Wings of Peace VR: DayBreak" is a combination of space positioning defensive shooting game, players start the game before the deployment of team players position, the rational use of terrain to share enemy firepower.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: Intel Core i5 - 4590 equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD R9 290 or NVIDIA GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64bit Processor: Intel Core i7-6700 equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Fury or NVIDIA GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
